hero.title: Building Bridges of Hope
hero.subtitle: Supporting teenagers affected by familial incarceration with resources, mentorship, and unwavering hope for a brighter future.

about.title: About Teens Anchor Initiative
about.hero_text: Teens Anchor Initiative was founded on the belief that every teenager deserves support, regardless of the challenges their family faces. We are dedicated to breaking cycles and building brighter futures.
about.mission_text: To provide comprehensive support, resources, and hope for teenagers whose lives have been affected by the incarceration of family members.
about.vision_text: A world where every teenager, regardless of their family circumstances, has access to the support and opportunities they need to thrive.
about.story_p1: Teens Anchor Initiative began in 2018 when a group of social workers, former system-impacted youth, and community advocates recognized a critical gap in services for teenagers affected by familial incarceration.
about.story_p2: What started as a small support group in New York has grown into an international organization serving communities in the United States and Kenya. Our programs are designed by and for the community, ensuring cultural relevance and effectiveness.
about.story_p3: Today, we continue to expand our reach while maintaining our core commitment to personalized, trauma-informed care that honors each teen's unique experience and potential.
about.values_text: These core values guide everything we do and shape how we serve our community.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We approach every interaction with empathy, understanding, and unconditional support.

community.title: Community
community.description: We believe in the power of connection and creating supportive networks for healing and growth.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We focus on building resilience and helping teens discover their own strength and potential.

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.description: We welcome and support teens from all backgrounds, cultures, and circumstances.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for the highest standards in our programs and services.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: We are committed to continuous learning and improvement in our approach.

about.team_text: Our dedicated team brings together diverse expertise and lived experience to support teens and families with compassion and professionalism.

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.bio: Sarah has over 15 years of experience in social work and nonprofit leadership, specializing in youth advocacy and family support services.

michael.name: Dr. Michael Chen
michael.bio: A licensed clinical psychologist with expertise in trauma-informed care for adolescents and family systems therapy.

amara.name: Amara Okafor
amara.bio: Amara leads our Kenya operations and brings deep understanding of community-based support systems in East Africa.

roberto.name: Roberto Martinez
roberto.bio: Roberto coordinates our mentorship programs and has lived experience navigating family incarceration as a teenager.

about.impact_text: Since our founding, we've been privileged to support hundreds of teens and their families through difficult times.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.social_work_desc: Professional counseling and support services tailored for teens facing family challenges.
programs.mentoring_desc: One-on-one mentorship programs connecting teens with positive role models.
programs.empowerment_desc: Programs focused on building confidence, life skills, and future planning.
programs.community_desc: Creating supportive communities where teens can connect and share experiences.

volunteer.heading: Volunteer With Us
volunteer.text: Share your time, skills, and passion to directly impact the lives of teenagers who need support and guidance during challenging times.

partnerships.heading: Partner With Us
partnerships.text: Organizations, businesses, and institutions can amplify their impact by partnering with Teens Anchor Initiative to support our mission.
